data.title: Neil Patrick Harris celebrates 13 year anniversary with husband David Burtka
data.meta_description: Neil Patrick Harris and husband David Burtka celebrated their 13 year anniversary on Saturday, the couple are proud parents to six-year-old twins - Harper and Gideon
data.text:
How I Met Your Mother actor Neil Patrick Harris paid a heart-warming tribute to his husband David Burtka as they celebrated their 13 year anniversary on Saturday. Taking to his Instagram page, the 43-year-old star posted a beautiful picture of his partner and their six-year-old son Gideon alongside the caption: "Thirteen years and one day ago, I crossed paths with the guy on the left. The adventures have never ceased. The love has never waned. The gifts are never ending (the guy on the right, e.g.). Happy Anniversary, @dbelicious. You're the best."

READ: David Burtka on whether he and Neil Patrick Harris are planning for more kids

The couple, who are parents to six-year-old twins Harper and Gideon, began dating in 2004 before tying the knot ten years later. David, 41, also took to his social media pages to mark the occasion. "Yesterday was mine and @nph 13th year anniversary," he gushed. "Thank you Neil for being compassionate, adventurous, and an all around fantastic man. I love you more than ever."

WATCH: Neil Patrick Harris splits his pants during epic Broadway showdown with James Corden

The Emmy Award-winner has previously said that he had been waiting for the right time to get married. The couple got engaged in 2006 but had to wait to marry until the state of New York had passed the Marriage Equality Act. At the time, Neil shared his excitement by tweeting: "It PASSED! Marriage equality in NY!! Yes!! Progress!! David and I did propose to each other, but over five years ago! We've been wearing engagement rings for ages, waiting for an available date."

STORY: Neil Patrick Harris and David Burtka marry after ten years
